Profile

Technical leader with fifteen years of experience designing, securing, and scaling enterprise cloud platforms. Specialized in multi-tenant cloud architecture, security-by-default infrastructure, and platform enablement for large engineering organizations. Expert-level proficiency in AWS, Microsoft Azure, and Infrastructure as Code. Proven record of leading high-ambiguity initiatives, defining long-term technical direction, and creating force-multipliers to enable engineering organizations.

Professional Experience

Crown Castle

Canonsburg, PA

Senior Cloud Platform Engineer

March 2024 to Present

  • Led the architectural separation of a shared enterprise cloud platform into three independently governed environments during a corporate divestment, defining IAM boundaries, network isolation, data ownership, and migration sequencing to eliminate cross-entity blast radius while maintaining zero downtime.
  • Designed and delivered the organization’s first external-facing API platform using Amazon API Gateway, establishing secure patterns for authentication, authorization, rate limiting, and customer integration at scale.
  • Defined a standardized platform requirements and intake framework, transforming ad-hoc infrastructure requests into a predictable, auditable delivery model aligned with security and compliance controls.
  • Founded and led an internal cloud platform enablement program to scale platform knowledge across engineering teams, reducing reliance on the platform team and accelerating adoption of standardized cloud patterns.
  • Established a technical leadership program within the platform organization to formalize mentorship, architectural review, and knowledge sharing, improving delivery consistency across initiatives.

Cloud Platform Engineer III

June 2022 to March 2024

  • Redefined the organization’s privileged access model by eliminating standing credentials across AWS environments, designing a short-lived, identity-aware access architecture using Teleport that materially reduced lateral movement risk and improved audit posture.
  • Designed a standardized infrastructure delivery platform using Terraform, CI/CD pipelines, and policy-as-code (Checkov), enabling teams to self-service compliant infrastructure while preventing non-conformant deployments by default.
  • Led the architectural decision and execution to migrate critical infrastructure and workloads from Azure to AWS, balancing cost, reliability, security posture, and operational maturity.
  • Integrated automated tag validation and governance into CI/CD pipelines to enforce CMDB standards, significantly improving cloud cost attribution, chargeback accuracy, and financial visibility.

Systems Engineer III

July 2020 to June 2022

  • Architected and managed a multi-region Azure environment for a 5,000+ employee enterprise using Infrastructure as Code (IaC) with Terraform to eliminate configuration drift and establish repeatable deployment patterns.
  • Defined and enforced CIS and SOX-aligned security controls across hybrid environments, improving audit readiness and reducing compliance risk.
  • Designed enterprise monitoring and alerting strategies to improve reliability and reduce mean time to detection for critical services.
  • Owned complex identity and collaboration infrastructure including Active Directory, Office 365, Exchange Online, and Teams.
